'''''Lactarius semisanguifluus''''' is a species of [[fungus]] in the [[Russulaceae]] family.<ref name=Hesler1979>{{cite book |title=North American Species of ''Lactarius'' |last=Hesler LR, Smith AH. |year=1979 |publisher=The University of Michigan Press |location=Michigan |pages=536–37 |isbn=0-472-08440-2}}</ref>
